Text: How are you guys syncing the mp3's to these?

there are tutorials on the internet just search for "ultrastar add songs" 

in short:
you have to put the *.txt in a separate folder (its good to name it like the artist + title)
then you copy the *.mp3 in that created folder
then you open the *.txt and look at the "MP3:"-thing
the *.mp3 has to have the same name as stated in the *.txt

hope you understood everything, english is not my mothers tongue

lg
yoless
Thanks for uploading - they're all simply great =D
